snippet.title: The Life and Suffering of Sir Brante | Trailer
snippet.description:
The Life and Suffering of Sir Brante has been released!

The Life and Suffering of Sir Brante is a narrative-driven text-based RPG set in a ruthless medieval realm that comes to life on the pages of the protagonist's journal.

Who will he become — a judge, an inquisitor, or a rebel? The choice is yours!

The game is widely regarded as one of the most anticipated text-based titles of 2021 with more than 1500 positive reviews on Steam. Grab your copy now:
101XP https://store.101xp.com/ru/games/brante
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1272160/The_Life_and_Suffering_of_Sir_Brante/
GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/the_life_and_suffering_of_sir_brante
EGS https://www.epicgames.com/store/en-US/p/the-life-and-suffering-of-sir-brante
Xbox Store https://www.xbox.com/en-us/games/store/the-life-and-suffering-of-sir-brante/9pg6h6dthw4s
